name: HealthLiteracyDiagnosesSNOMEDCT
title: Health Literacy Diagnoses SNOMED CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> The terms in this value set represent the diagnoses associated with Health Literacy as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR implementation guide as well as other uses of this SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Requires plain language intervention to support health literacy (finding)
Requires document translation service to support health literacy (finding)
Requires language interpretation service to support health literacy (finding)
Requires culturally responsive service to support health literacy (finding)
Requires assistive technology to support health literacy (finding)
